trans-unit.source: Provides the implementation for a client formatter sink provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供为客户端格式化程序接收器提供程序的实现。

trans-unit.source: A SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider creates client formatter sinks that use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter> to serialize messages for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.
trans-unit.target: SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider 创建客户端使用的格式化程序接收器<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>来序列化消息的远程处理从流过的客户端通道的消息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序接收器的作用是生成必要的标头并序列化到流的消息。

trans-unit.source: After reaching the formatter sink, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> is forwarded to all sinks in the channel sink chain through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 在到达格式化程序接收器后<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>转发到通过该通道接收器链中的所有接收器<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A>或<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A>调用。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>

trans-unit.source: At this stage the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段消息已序列化，并且仅作为信息提供。

trans-unit.source: Sinks that need to create or modify the message must be placed in the sink chain before the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 需要创建或修改消息的接收器必须放置在之前格式化程序接收器链中。

trans-unit.source: This can be achieved by implementing both the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过实现同时实现<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink>接口。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>

trans-unit.source: The formatter sink can be placed in the sink chain later.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序接收器可将该接收器链中更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Formatter sinks use sink configuration properties to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序接收器使用接收器配置属性在运行时配置的通道。

trans-unit.source: Sink properties can be specified in a configuration file, or programmatically, inside of a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 接收器属性可以指定在配置文件中，或以编程方式，一种<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>内

trans-unit.source: In a configuration file all values are represented by strings, but when building a property <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> programmatically, value types can be specified with their native values or with strings.
trans-unit.target: 在配置文件中所有值都表示通过字符串，但生成的属性时<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>其本机值或字符串与以编程方式，可以指定值类型。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sink configuration properties that can be specified for the current sink provider.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的接收器可以为当前的接收器提供程序指定的配置属性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式化程序是否将包括版本信息。

trans-unit.source: Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 值为`true`或`false`。 | &1;> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 与不受信任的数据或在不安全通道使用此对象的实例会带来安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel.
trans-unit.target: 使用此对象仅与受信任的数据以及跨安全通道。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[不受信任的数据安全风险](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>类使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref> class with the given properties and provider data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>与给定的属性和提供程序数据的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of configuration properties to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>配置属性，若要使用的新实例的<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of provider data to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的提供程序数据，若要使用的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates a sink chain.
trans-unit.target: 创建接收器链。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> method is called, it creates its own channel sink, forwards the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> call to the next sink provider in the chain (if there is one), and ensures that the next sink and the current one are linked together.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>方法被调用时，它会创建其自己的通道接收器，转发<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>调用链 （如果有） 中的下一步接收器提供程序，并确保下一个接收器和当前链接在一起。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>

trans-unit.source: Channel for which this sink chain is being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 正在为其构造此接收器链的通道。

trans-unit.source: URL of object to connect to or the channel URI for the target object.
trans-unit.target: 要连接到对象或目标对象的通道 URI 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A channel data object describing a channel on the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 描述在远程服务器上的通道的通道数据对象。

trans-unit.source: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 新构成的通道接收器链的第一个接收器或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，指示此提供程序将不会或无法提供此终结点的连接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置下一步<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref>接收器提供程序链中。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref>接收器提供程序链中。
